author: Sophie Meixner
title: Loss of smell and taste in some COVID-19 patients may be long term or permanent, expert warns
description: A leading Australian ear, nose and throat surgeon warns widely reported symptoms of loss of taste and smell in COVID-19 cases may linger long after some patients have recovered from the virus.
content:
Updated 
April 03, 2020 18:32:45
A leading Australian ear, nose and throat surgeon has warned widely reported symptoms of loss of taste and smell in COVID-19 cases may linger long after some patients have recovered from the virus.
